attributes.action: disallow MPs to remain as MPs if they change from one party to another.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Quentin Davies was elected as an MP for the Conservative party. He has now defected to the Labour party, and as such is not representing those who elected him He should instantly have to resign and seek a labour seat, that way his constituents will be given the choice of electing a replacement MP.
